attributes.action: Allow families to get together for Christmas Day,  even in tier 4
attributes.additional_details: The nation has suffered & sacrificed enough this year. We need this one day. It’s always just one day, but we we’re all relying on this “one day” this year....They called a cease fire and opposing nations played football on a Boxing Day in the middle of a world war. Let Christmas Day to go ahead, even under Tier 4.
attributes.background: Make an exemption for Christmas Day gatherings to go ahead in the UK, even under tier 4- just for Christmas Day.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
